game.name: Aliens Attack
game.description:
The whole Earth is under attack by a horde of the deadly aliens! Oh no! These evil forces from Mars are looking forward to invade your planet. You as a part of the team of slightly forgotten heroes are the last hope for the entire humanity. Would you think that you can handle this job perfectly in this latest action game? Join Aliens Attack and be prepared to guide Ramdo, Sgt. Pepper, Ivan, Mr. Zee and Bernie to fight against the dangerous blue invaders!

Common boys! Now it will be in your hands how you lead those respected martians! Try to fight like a pro and make sure that they will leave our planet forever! The best part is that you have a super machine gun that fires automatically. All you need to do is just move him left or right to avoid the lasers released by the blood-thirsty enemies. Try to kill as many aliens as you can and grab the enough medals to purchase new weapons or some cool laser-proof jackets for your heroes!

Be careful and keep moving your character left and right to clear the screen from these evil forces! Continue your fight until you kill their leaders and provide your planet with the utmost protection in this HTML5 shooting game! Remember the waves of aliens will keep coming on your way. Use your fighting skills to defend your base and save your planet and the president as well in this cool single person shooter challenge! Check out even more challenging shooter games on atmegame.com for free without download!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP L SIDE OF SCREEN TO JUMP, RIGHT SIDE TAP TO SHOOT
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE/UP ARROW TO JUMP, SPACE-SHOOT
